divs: sighting detailswe were walking to my stepsons condo on outskirts of boulder, my friend and i both looked up at what we thought was a shooting star,but was barely moving when we saw it. you could make out shape of cigar by the orange ( harvest moon color) light that glowed from right 1\3 of ufo. we were looking east. it appeared to move very slowly then darted upward and disappeared. i have been very obsessed with the night sky at home in washington after seeing this. i go over it in my mind and can find no rational answer to what we saw. i just wish i had had a camera.
trends: There have been 30 other sightings in Boulder
There were no other sightings in Boulder on or around June 19th 2010
Summary: Large cigar shaped in sky about one third was lit up glowing orange, moving very slowly then disappeared.
